content: knitted and felted trivet in drops snow the piece is worked with bobbles and heart theme christmas ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-655 yarn group e or c + c **size** measurements before felting approx 28 x 32 cm = 11 x 12 1/2 measurements after felting approx 18 x 18 cm = 7 x 7 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio yarn group e 150 g color 46 medium grey 50 g color 56 christmas red **knitting gauge ** 11 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 before felting needles drops needles size 8 mm = us 11 the needle size is only a guide if you have too many stitches in 10 cm/4 change to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches in 10 cm/4 change to a smaller needle size
